headlines.description: — Pep Guardiola has made some curious team selections in Manchester City’s run of losses against Chelsea.
headlines.shortLinkText: City ends run of losses to Chelsea with 1-0 win in EPL

headlines.description: Manchester United were beaten 1-0 at Old Trafford by Aston Villa on Saturday following Kortney Hause's 88th-minute winner.
headlines.shortLinkText: Man Utd beaten at home; Fernandes misses pen

headlines.description: Andros Townsend and Abdoulaye Doucoure were on target as Everton beat Norwich City 2-0.
headlines.shortLinkText: Everton condemn Norwich to sixth PL defeat

events.name: West Ham United at Leeds United

headlines.description: An 90th-minute goal by in-form striker Michail Antonio gave West Ham United a comeback 2-1 win at Leeds United in the Premier League on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Late Antonio strike gives West Ham win at Leeds

headlines.description: Burnley were denied their first Premier League win of the season at Leicester City as Jamie Vardy scored an own goal before scoring for the Foxes.
headlines.shortLinkText: Leicester's Vardy scores at both ends in 2-2 draw with Burnley

headlines.description: — Newcastle was still waiting for its first Premier League win of the season after Ismaila Sarr’s equalizer grabbed a 1-1 draw for Watford on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Newcastle still without EPL win after 1-1 draw at Watford

headlines.description: Substitute Yoane Wissa scored in the 82nd minute to help Brentford snatch a 3-3 draw against Liverpool on Saturday in the Premier League.
headlines.shortLinkText: Liverpool draw with Brentford in six-goal thriller
